Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12500. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I trust this proposal aligns well with your budget and strategic goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
